data.title: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Discovery Center
data.meta_description: Meet one of the official VisitSeattle.org partners, The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Discovery Center here.
data.text:
Encounter powerful stories about the impact of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and its partners on improving the quality of life for billions of people.

The Discovery Centerâ€™s interactive exhibits let you explore first-hand bold, innovative solutions to the most pressing challenges facing communities around the globe.

Bring your curiosity and leave inspired to take action on a cause you care about. The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation Discovery Center is open 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Wed-Sat, with a public tour offered at 2 p.m. Admission is free.
